pages.text: 19|26|Ni chi ba, ni he ba, ni yukuai ba! Ruguo ni jian ren lai, ni keyi shuo:‘Wo que yi xiang zhiren zhu fayuan zhaijie, suoyi wo jue budui renhe ren shuohua’.”
19|27|Ta baozhe ying'er lai jian ta de zuren, tamen shuo:“Mai er yan a! Ni que yi zuole yi jian qi shi.
19|28|Ha lun de meimei a! Ni fuqin bushi quede de, ni muqin bushi shijie de.”
19|29|Ta jiu zhi yi zhi nage ying'er, tamen shuo:“Women zen neng dui yaolan li de ying'er shuohua ne?”
19|30|Na ying'er shuo:“Wo que shi an la de puren, ta yao ba jingdian shangci wo, yao shi wo zuo xianzhi,
19|31|yao shi wo wulun zai nali dou shi youfu de, bingqie zhufu wo, zhiyao huozhe jiu yao jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke,
19|32|(ta shi wo) xiaojing wo de muqin, ta meiyou shi wo zuo badao de, boming de ren.
19|33|Wo zai chusheng zhi ri, siwang ri, fuhuo ri, dou xiangshou heping.”
19|34|Zhe jiushi mai er yan de erzi er sa, zhe shi tamen suo zhenglun de zhenli zhi yan.
19|35|“An la bu hui shouyang erzi——zansong an la, chaojue wanwu——dang ta panjue yi jian shiqing de shihou, ta zhi dui na jian shi shuo:‘You’, ta jiu youle.
19|36|An la que shi wo de zhu, ye que shi nimen de zhu, suoyi nimen yingdang chongbai ta. Zhe shi zhenglu.”
19|37|Dan ge pai zhi jian yijian fenqi. Zhongda ri lailin de shihou, bei'ai guiyu buxindao zhe.
19|38|Tamen lai jian wo di na ri, tamen de er zhen cong, tamen de yan zhen ming, dan bu yi zhe, jintian que zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.
